src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/hydrodynamics_g.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Calculate the velocity and the pressure in the pressure grid based on the values of pressure (gbar) distribution function after the streaming step for the parallel dual grid D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM.
